snippet.title: The Sims 4 My Wedding Stories: Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Say “I do” to your Sim’s dream wedding with The Sims™ 4 My Wedding Stories Game Pack*, launching February 23 at 10 a.m. PT.

Choose a Sim of Honor and get ready for a whole lot of fun and planning. There’s a lot to do before your Sim’s big day. Tour venues, taste cakes, and choose the perfect flowers! You’ve also got events like engagement dinners, rehearsal dinners, and big nights out to look forward to. With My Wedding Stories, you’re not just throwing one party—you’re crafting a detailed love story that reflects your Sim’s taste.

Available ­­­February 23 at 10 a.m. PT on Origin PC/Mac, Steam, Xbox One, Xbox Series X | S, PlayStation®4, and PlayStation®5.

Learn more: https://www.ea.com/games/the-sims/the-sims-4/wedding-rsvp

*REQUIRES THE SIMS 4 (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES. FOR PC, SEE MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR THE PACK.
